title: 820-3024B
message: THIS BOARD have 3 BEEPS, is it possible to repair this board? and this does not return the same problem, or I don't invest time in this repair? board trash?

title: 820-3024B
message:
Could be RAM issue, but also CPU.
Also can be broken solders/traces under RAM, or CPU.

If you want to invest time, should CHANGE ALL RAM chips.

title: 820-3024B
message: reflow ram memory or cpu not a good idea? it is possible return the same problem?
